dev.kkorolyov.pancake

Class GameSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.GameSystem

  • public abstract class GameSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs work on entities matching a certain component signature.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameSystem(Signature signature)
      Constructs a new system with arbitrary entity order.
      GameSystem(Signature signature, java.util.Comparator<Entity> comparator)
      Constructs a new system.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameSystem

        public GameSystem(Signature signature)
        Constructs a new system with arbitrary entity order.
        Parameters:
        signature - defines all components an entity must have to be affected by this system

      • GameSystem

        public GameSystem(Signature signature,
                  java.util.Comparator<Entity> comparator)
        Constructs a new system.
        Parameters:
        signature - defines all components an entity must have to be affected by this system
        comparator - defines the order in which entities are supplied to this system

        Parameters:
        dt - seconds elapsed since last update
